Brutal Flurry

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, monk, Flurry of Blows class feature
Benefit: Whenever you target only one creature with your Flurry of Blows power, the creature takes 2 extra damage. The extra damage increases to 4 at 21st level.

Published in Player's Handbook 3, page(s) 185.
